channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0149; 03:14AM; 645 N Gardner St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KCizHD; #Fairfax; Despite dense exterior storage and heavy fire that consumed the attic of the structure, 35 LAFD Firefighters took just 31 minutes (3:45 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in a one story residential duplex. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; AR1 BC5 E227 E229 E261 E27 E41 E52 E61 RA61 T27 T29 T61; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

CONTAINED - Brush Fire; INC#1257; 06:40PM; Cahuenga Peak; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QxxNRW; #HollywoodHills; A series of precise LAFD helicopter water drops have stopped forward progress of the fire at approximately one (1) acre of brush in remote, rugged terrain northwest of Mt. Lee. No injury. No structure threat or damage. LAFD ground crews will remain at scene tonight to complete extinguishment at the perimeter of the burn area to assure final extinguishment. The fire's cause is currently "under active investigation". Though a pair of male hikers were seen on trails near the fire, their specific actions and intent have yet to be determined. They are at this time best described as "persons of interest", rather than suspects.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC14 BC5 CE83 E227 E260 E27 E278 E290 E56 E60 E76 E8136 E8138 E82 E82C E86 E90 EA1 EM14 H0A H0E H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA86 T27 T60 T78 T90 + Burbank FD + LACoFD + Park Rangers; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Train vs Pedestrian Fatality; INC#1343; 06:16PM; 1100 Truman Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rYaFSq; City of #SanFernando; PRELIM: One person (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased at scene after apparently being struck by (outbound) Metrolink Antelope Valley Line Train #225. Train is still at scene. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: San Fernando PD / Metrolink / Medical Examiner. ; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; E75 RA18; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1257; 05:29PM; Cahuenga Peak; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QxxNRW; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to less than one-quarter (0.25) acre brush burning in remote and rugged terrain northwest of Mt. Lee.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E27 E278 E60 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 T27 T60 T78 + Burbank E15; CH5; 14; Brian Humphrey

Update #MediaAdvisory - Pedestrians Struck; INC#0468; 10:45AM; 11041 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/43X19fT; #MissionHills; LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Erik Scott is en route to the scene to assist media, and offer patient updates. His ETA is 11:05 AM PDT.; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E75 E87 EM15 HR3 PI1 RA7 RA75 RA87 T75 UR88; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Update Pedestrians Struck; INC#0468; 10:20AM; 11041 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/43X19fT; #MissionHills; Solo vehicle driven by an adult female (business patron) entered the enclosed service drive of a car dealership, striking and injuring four adults (*two workers and two patrons*). The vehicle damaged and came to rest in a customer reception area within the structure. Witnesses describe an adult female (business patron) who was in or near the enclosed driveway, being briefly trapped beneath the vehicle before being freed by bystanders, including an off-duty nurse who initiated CPR on the pulseless and non-breathing woman, quickly taken to a regional trauma center in grave condition. Two adult male workers (one with a head wound) sustained non-life threatening injuries, and were taken by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in fair condition. The adult female driver of the car, with no obvious or expressed injury, declined offered ambulance transportation. She remains at scene speaking with LAPD Officers. Note: LAFD has no update on the gravely injured patient. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1293); FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E75 E87 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA75 RA87 T75 UR88; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrians Struck; INC#0468; 09:11AM; 11041 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/43X19fT; #MissionHills; PRELIM: Solo vehicle reportedly struck and injured *four* workers at a car dealership, briefly trapping one beneath the vehicle, who is in grave condition. Another has a head injury, and two others with unspecified 'minor' injuries. ; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E75 E87 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA75 RA87 T75 UR88; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN - Brush Fire; INC#0768; 12:41PM; 400 N Park Row Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rXmEjf; #ElysianPark; First arriving 45 LAFD ground-based firefighters took just 25 minutes to access and extinguish one-quarter (0.25) acre of grass and brush in hillside terrain. No injury. No structure threat or damage. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E11 E2 E201 E202 E203 E290 E3 E4 E44 EA1 EM13 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA1 RA801 T1 T2 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0768; 12:16PM; 400 N Park Row Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rXmEjf; #ElysianPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to one-quarter (0.25) acre light-to-medium vegetation burning uphill, threatening to enter heavier brush. No wind. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E2 E201 E202 E203 E290 E3 E4 E44 EM13 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA1 RA801 T1 T2 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Brush Fire; INC#1385; 07:10PM; 5400 W Zoo Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OGXTkd; #GriffithPark; This fire as confined to approximately three (3) acres of medium-to-heavy brush in steep terrain. LAFD ground crews will be joined by LACoFD Hand Crews in completing full extinguishment until at least 10 PM tonight. No injuries reported. The fire's cause remains under active investigation.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC14 BC2 BC5 BP47 CE59 CM20 CM22 E250 E27 E290 E35 E52 E56 E60 E76 E8136 E8140 E82 E86 EM11 H1 H2 H3 H7 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA7 RA35 RA56 T50 T90 + LACoFD; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey
